column1: 1594252804839051265,1594252804839051265@Ristray @vicjin66 @TheRaDR Yes, I too am puzzled & vaguely intrigued at the idea that other people might care about things I don’t, etc.   I mean, it’s kind of true, which is why my wife often has to remind me that not everyone is interested in hearing all about [random topic] I find super duper cool so 🤷‍♂️ t_end
